directions: In a mixing bowl, knead together potatoes, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, salt and water to form a stiff dough.  In a separate bowl, combine coconut and brown sugar.  Form potato dough into small balls; make a well in the center and fill with coconut mixture; close up hole and reshape balls.  Roll in sesame seeds, then in remaining cornstarch.
Heat oil in deep-fryer or deep, heavy-bottomed pan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Fry balls in oil until golden.  Drain on paper towels.  Serve.
ingredients: 3/4 pound sweet potatoes-- cooked, peeled and mashed
title: Deep-Fried Sweet Potato Balls
